summary:
This will allow you to play as the Spriggans from the dawnguard and dragonborn dlc, Earth Mother Spriggan and Burnt Spriggan.

They come with the same soft of stats so one isn't better than the other its more just the appearance of them that matters.

They both come with a summonable black bear kinda like how they did in
descriptionHtml:
Updated version here - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85550?] Playable Spriggans [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11105?] Playable Spriggans SSE [/url]

This will allow you to play as the Spriggans from the dawnguard and dragonborn dlc, Earth Mother Spriggan and Burnt Spriggan.

They come with the same soft of stats so one isn't better than the other its more just the appearance of them that matters.

They both come with a summonable black bear kinda like how they did in oblivion, they also have a lesser power spell that allows them to control creature type animals for a whole minute. To know if it worked or not they sure be marked with a green aura glow symbol on their body, I havent tested it out filly but i should work.. 

Earth Mother Spriggan Comes with a Dark Spriggan Spray and the Burnt Spriggans comes with a normal firebolt.

Both are resisted to poison by 100% and are resisted to damage by 50 points. Burnt is weak to frost by 25%

They also will have voices when attacking, getting hit and dying so it wont be silence.
author: Abbalovesyou
